headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Siemens Near Deal to Buy Dresser-Rand-Sources
headline.main: Exclusive: Siemens Near Deal to Buy Dresser-Rand-Sources

lead_paragraph: Industrial conglomerate Siemens AG is near an agreement to acquire U.S. oilfield equipment maker Dresser-Rand Group Inc for all cash, according to people familiar with the matter, in a move that would significantly boost the German company's oil and gas business in North America.
